name: Nuclear Defense
description:
Press ALT + ENTER to enter Full-Screen mode

Hi, thank you for taking an interest in Nuclear Defense!

Gameplay:

Walk in front of the destroyed turrets and hold down C (Action) to dismantle it and collect its resources. 

Once you have at least 3 of each resource, you may hold down C (Action) anywhere to build a turret. When a turret is built, pressing C (Action) while in front of it opens the Turret Menu, where you can upgrade the stats and other properties of the turret.

Default Controls:

Alt+Enter -> Full-Screen mode

X -> Jump

C -> Action

Arrow Keys -> Move/Jump

Space -> Pause
